title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – v101.101.51737.0.911 + 3 DLCs
body:
Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – v101.101.51737.0.911 + 3 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Strategy, RTS, Isometric, 2D
Companies: Forgotten Empires, Tantalus Media, Wicked Witch Software, Xbox Game Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI16
Original Size: 34.5 GB
Repack Size: from 7.5 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Age.of.Empires.II.Definitive.Edition.Dawn.of.the.Dukes-CODEX ISO: codex-age.of.empires.ii.definitive.edition.dawn.of.the.dukes.iso (37,065,850,880 bytes)
  • Game version: v101.101.51737.0.911; Lords of the West & Dawn of the Dukes DLCs are included by default; Enhanced Graphics Pack is included and available as an optional download
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of Enhanced Graphics Pack and voiceovers you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 34.5 to 7.5~24.8 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes (main game without EGP): ~10 minutes on 16-threads CPU; ~15 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • Installation with EGP is ~3 times longer
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 49.4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition celebrates the 20th anniversary of one of the most popular strategy games ever with stunning 4K Ultra HD graphics, a new and fully remastered soundtrack, and brand-new content, “The Last Khans” with 3 new campaigns and 4 new civilizations.

Explore all the original campaigns like never before as well as the best-selling expansions, spanning over 200 hours of gameplay and 1,000 years of human history. Head online to challenge other players with 35 different civilizations in your quest for world domination throughout the ages.

Choose your path to greatness with this definitive remaster to one of the most beloved strategy games of all time.

Enhanced Graphics Pack

The Enhanced Graphics Pack increases Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition to ultra-high fidelity resolution. Before you attempt to install, please make sure that your system requirements meet or exceed the minimum specs for this content: 2.4 Ghz i5 or greater or AMD equivalent, 8 GB RAM, Nvidia® GTX 650 / AMD HD 5850 or better

You can skip downloading of Enhanced Graphics Pack and voiceover files or you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-hd-pack.bin + fg-optional-hd-pack-2.bin (Download only if you have an Ultra HD display, otherwise it’s pretty useless)
  • fg-selective-english.bin (REQUIRED for all languages withour their own voiceovers)
  • fg-selective-all-non-english.bin (REQUIRED for all languages but English)
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-korean.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game w/p EGP and with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective/optional” files, but download fg-selective-all-non-english.bin, fg-selective-spanish.bin & all main files (01-11).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is HEAVILY backwards compatible with previous AoE2DE repack. You can rehash these files to save up to 18.6 GB of traffic:

  • fg-01.bin
  • fg-02.bin
  • fg-04.bin
  • fg-optional-hd-pack.bin
  • fg-selective-all-non-english.bin

BTW, the game works under Windows 7, but is freaking memory hungry. Eats around 5-6 GB of RAM w/o Ultra textures and >10 GB with Ultra textures on a freshly created game map. So if you experience crashes, you should buy more RAM or increase page file at least.
